sentences.en: Arthur and Carl don't like each other. But Bill is friendly with them both.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟和卡尔都很讨厌对方，但是比尔却和他们两个都很好。

sentences.en: Arthur C Clarke is the doyen of science-fiction writers.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟∙C. 克拉克是科幻小说作家中的老前辈。

sentences.en: Arthur C Clarke likes to quote his friend and fellow SF writer Ray Bradbury.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟·C.克拉克喜欢引用他的朋友兼同事——科幻作家雷·布拉德伯里的话。

sentences.en: Arthur Murray taught the foxtrot, the tango and the waltz.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟·默里教狐步舞、探戈和华尔兹。
亚瑟的书趋于单调乏味.

sentences.en: Arthur's drinking caused him to be committed to a psychiatric hospital.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟由于酗酒被送进一家精神病医院。

sentences.en: At Merlin's instigation, Arthur founds the Fellowship of the Round Table.
sentences.cn: 在梅林的建议下，亚瑟王创建了圆桌骑士团。

sentences.en: He trudged wearily down Arthur Street.
sentences.cn: 他沿着亚瑟大街精疲力竭地跋涉。

sentences.en: His own pride forbids him to ask Arthur's help.
sentences.cn: 他的自尊心不允许他开口向阿瑟求助。

sentences.en: His son, Arthur Ochs Junior, is expected to succeed him as publisher.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子，小阿瑟·奥克斯，有望子承父业继续从事出版。

sentences.en: I was really rather fond of Arthur.
If Arthur was attracted here by the prospects of therapy, John came down purely and simply to make money.
sentences.cn: 如果阿瑟是被这种疗法的前景吸引到此，那么约翰则纯粹是为了赚钱而来。

sentences.en: King Arthur hid his treasures here and Merlin enchanted the cave so that nobody should ever find them.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟王将他的财宝藏在这里，墨林对洞穴施了魔法，这样永远不会有人找到那些财宝。

sentences.en: King Arthur himself captures the beast and cuts off its head.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟王亲自捉住怪物，并砍下它的头。

sentences.en: The story of King Arthur became part of oral tradition.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟王的故事成为口头传说的一部分。

sentences.en: Year after year I have had a letter from Arthur on New Year's Day.
sentences.cn: 每年新年之际我都收到阿瑟的来信.

phrases.tran_cn: 亚瑟王（电影名，是英格兰传说中的国王）
阿瑟港（旅顺港在西方的称呼或美国、加拿大港市）
